title: California Five-Star Heritage Charm in Pasadena with Spa, Pool & Three Restaurants
description:
Discover the timeless elegance of a grand five-star hotel steeped in tradition and sophistication. Set in the heart of Californiaâ€™s Pasadena region, this magnificent retreat is a nod to a bygone era, adored in classic hardwood furnishings, rich tapestries, and Italian marble ensuites. Indulge in culinary delights at The Royce Wood-Fired Steakhouse, sip on handcrafted cocktails at Tap Room, or rejuvenate at the Chuan Spa, inspired by traditional Chinese medicine.

For those seeking outdoor adventure, the nearby San Gabriel Mountains offer breathtaking hiking trails and sweeping vistas, while the resort pool is lined by plush sunbeds and umbrellas, perfect for enjoying the Californian sunshine. Treat yourself to an afternoon of sophistication with a traditional Langham afternoon tea experience, complimented by cloud-like scones with rich cream and jam, fine pastries and inspired savoury bites.
